dcterms:description: This Amazon annotation dataset is sampled from Alexa live traffic and is an enterprise-scale spoken language data of dialog interaction between human and conversational AI agent. The dataset includes Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) text for utterance, annotated by human annotators. There are 30 plus different classes for this task, with an imbalance factor of 110 and 6% noisy labels.
dcterms:title: Amazon annotation

dcterms:description: Amazon review is one of the largest product review datasets, widely used with imbalanced classification benchmark methods. It contains Amazon product reviews and metadata across 19 years, including 142.8 million reviews for 29 product categories such as Books, Electronics, Beauty, etc. The dataset has an imbalance factor of 51.3.
dcterms:title: Amazon review
